mapper.select: SELECT BID, CATE_CD, TITLE, CONTENT, TAG, VIEW_CNT, REG_ID, REG_DT, EDIT_DT FROM BOARD.BOARD_TABLE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_TABLE (CATE_CD, TITLE, CONTENT, TAG, VIEW_CNT, REG_ID, REG_DT, EDIT_DT) VALUES( #{cate_cd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title}, #{content}, #{tag}, 0, #{reg_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_TABLE SET CATE_CD = #{cate_cd}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, TAG = #{tag}, EDIT_DT = now() WHERE BID = ${bid}
UPDATE BOARD_TABLE SET VIEW_CNT = VIEW_CNT+1 WHERE BID = #{bid}
